purpose: The email announces two postdoctoral positions available at UCLouvain, Belgium, specifically for candidates with a Ph.D. in computer science who are currently outside Belgium. The positions are part of the RAINDROP project, focusing on edge/cloud computing, and offer competitive salaries and support. Candidates are encouraged to develop independent research projects aligned with their interests, with mentorship from faculty members.
evidence_sentences: We invite applications for two postdoctoral positions at UCLouvain, Belgium.
